local_intent: Execute a precise pinch grasp on the grape bunch using the computed grasp pose.
assumptions: Target grape bunch is reachable from above
Computed pinch grasp remains valid during approach
Plate is not involved in this grasp phase
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp segment of GLOBAL_BT: visibility check, move-above, compute pinch grasp, open, align, pick, then verify stability.
